sections.name: Kerrdremak
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

link.name: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 54
link.alt: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 54

link.name: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 54
link.alt: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 54

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Lawful
traits.text: Lawful effects often manipulate energy from law-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to chaotic divine servants or divine servants of chaotic deities. A creature with this trait is lawful in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Humanoid
traits.text: Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.

traits.name: Kobold
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the kobold ancestry, reptilian humanoids who are usually Small and typically have darkvision. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by kobolds.

link.name: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 54
link.alt: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 54

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still calculate damage using Strength.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than its listed type. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon with versatile S can deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you attack.

ability.name: Whispering Retreat

traits.name: Divine
traits.text:
This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.  
  
A creature with this trait is primarily constituted of or has a strong connection to divine magic.

traits.name: Emotion
traits.text: This effect alters a creature’s emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.

traits.name: Enchantment
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the enchantment school of magic, typically involving mind control, emotion alteration, and other mental effects.

traits.name: Fear
traits.text: Fear effects evoke the emotion of fear. Effects with this trait always have the mental and emotion traits as well.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target’s mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

ability.requirement: Kerrdremak is adjacent to at least one enemy
ability.effect: Kerrdremak whispers under his breath, and one adjacent enemy must attempt a DC 17 Will save or become frightened 1 as they hear a whispering voice just behind them that claims to know when the target will die; the target is then temporarily immune to Whispering Retreat for 1 hour. Kerrdremak then Strides, and this movement doesn't trigger reactions from frightened creatures. He must end this movement in a space that isn't adjacent to any enemy
